subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Daisuke Matsuzaka’s spring training debut with the Boston Red Sox began when he gave up a leadoff double to a college junior. The Japanese star retired the six other batters he faced Friday.
snippet: Daisuke Matsuzaka’s spring training debut with the Boston Red Sox began when he gave up a leadoff double to a college junior. The Japanese star retired the six other batters he faced Friday.
